    level="1"

>
[Vengeful Arm](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1809)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Tattoo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=262" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 305

**Price** 100 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

**Access** Followers of Abraxas from Nex have access to this tattoo.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

[Abraxas](/Deities.aspx?ID=71) teaches that an eye for an eye is the basis of law. This tattoo of a coiled viper provides a +1 item bonus to [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) checks.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> envision;     **Effect** Abraxas transforms the tattoo into a weapon of your vengeance. The _vengeful arm_ crawls into your hand and becomes a [retribution axe](/Equipment.aspx?ID=393). You can use this activation again while holding the axe to revert the vengeful arm to a tattoo. Like other _retribution axes_, you can etch fundamental runes into the _vengeful arm's_ _retribution axe_ to increase its potency or to add [_striking_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
